title: Australia's greatest river
brief_description: A study of the Murray River and the countryside and towns along its banks. Emphasizes the danger of over stocking, over cropping, and forest fires, and shows how steps are being taken to overcome these.
description: A study of the Murray River and the countryside and towns along its banks. Emphasizes the danger of over stocking, over cropping, and forest fires, and shows how steps are being taken to overcome these.
